info.title: Figshare API
info.description: Figshare apiv2. Using Swagger, linking with pyramid through pyramid_swagger

get.description: Returns a list of public articles

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Used for pagination with page_size

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results included on a page. Used for pagination with page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results included on a page. Used for pagination with query

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Where to start the listing(the offset of the first result). Used for pagination with limit

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The field by which to order. Default varies by endpoint/resource.

parameters.name: institution
parameters.description: only return collections from this institution

parameters.name: published_since
parameters.description: Filter by article publishing date. Will only return articles published after the date. date(ISO 8601) YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: modified_since
parameters.description: Filter by article modified date. Will only return articles published after the date. date(ISO 8601) YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: only return collections from this group

parameters.name: resource_doi
parameters.description: only return collections with this resource_doi

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: Only return collections with the respective type. Mapping for item_type is: 1 - Figure, 2 - Media, 3 - Dataset, 4 - Fileset, 5 - Poster, 6 - Paper, 7 - Presentation, 8 - Thesis, 9 - Code, 12 - Preprint

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Syntax is correct but one of the parameters isn't correctly processed

post.description: Returns a list of public articles, filtered by the search parameters

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Syntax is correct but one of the parameters isn't correctly processed

400.description: Bad request. Article ID must be an integer and bigger than 0.

get.summary: Public Article Embargo for article version
Public Article Confidentiality for article version

post.description: Returns a list of private articles filtered by the search parameters

parameters.description: Page number. Used for pagination with page_size

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results included on a page. Used for pagination with page

200.description: OK. An array of articles belonging to the account

post.description: Create a new Article by sending article information

put.description: Updating an article by passing body parameters

get.description: View a private article embargo details

put.description: Note: setting an article under whole embargo does not imply that the article will be published when the embargo will expire. You must explicitly call the publish endpoint to enable this functionality.

delete.description: Will lift the embargo for the specified article

post.description:
- If the whole article is under embargo, it will not be published immediatly, but when the embargo expires or is lifted.
- When an article is published, a new public version will be generated. Any further updates to the article will affect the private article data. In order to make these changes publicly visible, an explicit publish operation is needed.
Reserve DOI for article
Associate new authors with the article. This will add new authors to the list of already associated authors

put.description: Associate new authors with the article. This will remove all already associated authors and add these new ones

400.description: Bad request. Article ID must be an integer and bigger than 0. Author with ID Not Found.

post.description: Associate new categories with the article. This will add new categories to the list of already associated categories

put.description: Associate new categories with the article. This will remove all already associated categories and add these new ones

post.description: Create new private link for this article

put.description: Update existing private link for this article

delete.description: Disable/delete private link for this article

post.description: Initiate new file upload within the article. Either use link to provide only an existing file that will not be uploaded on figshare or use the other 3 parameters(md5, name, size)
Complete file upload

parameters.description: The field by which to order. Default varies by endpoint/resource.

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: only return collections from this institution

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: Any combination of owner, collaborator, viewer separated by comma. Examples: "owner" or "owner,collaborator".

put.description: Updating an project by passing body parameters

delete.description:
A project can be deleted only if: - it is not public - it does not have public articles.

When an individual project is deleted, all the articles are moved to my data of each owner*.

When a group project is deleted, all the articles and files are deleted as well. Only project owner, group admin and above can delete a project.

post.description: Please note: project's owner cannot leave the project.

This is a private endpoint that requires OAuth. It will return a list with figshare public licenses AND licenses defined for account's institution.

200.description: OK. An array of personal licenses

institution_id.description: Return only authors associated to this institution

group_id.description: Return only authors in this group or subgroups of the group

is_active.description: Return only active authors if True

is_public.description: Return only authors that have published items if True

resource_id.description: only return collections with this resource_id

description.description: The article description. In a publisher case, usually this is the remote article description

tags.description: List of tags to be associated with the article. Keywords can be used instead

keywords.description: List of tags to be associated with the article. Tags can be used instead

references.description: List of links to be associated with the article (e.g ["http://link1", "http://link2", "http://link3"])

categories.description: List of category ids to be associated with the article(e.g [1, 23, 33, 66])

authors.description: List of authors to be assosciated with the article. The list can contain author ids or author names. No more than 10 authors. For adding more authors use the specific authors endpoint.

custom_fields.description: List of key, values pairs to be associated with the article

doi.description: Not appliable for regular users. In an institutional case, make sure your group supports setting DOIs. This setting is applied by figshare via opening a ticket through our support/helpdesk system.

resource_doi.description: Not applicable to regular users. In a publisher case, this is the publisher article DOI.

resource_title.description: Not applicable to regular users. In a publisher case, this is the publisher article title.

citation.example:
lilliput, figshare admin (2017): first project item. figshare.
 
 Retrieved: 14 01, May 22, 2017 (GMT)

embargo_date.description: Date when the embargo expires and the article gets published

embargo_type.description: Embargo can be enabled at the article or the file level. Possible values: article, file

is_public.description: if 1 then the author has published items

authors.description: List of authors to be assosciated with the article. The list can contain author ids or author names [{"id": 12121}, {"id": 34345}, {"name": "John Doe"}]. No more than 10 authors. For adding more authors use the specific authors endpoint.

expires_date.description: Date when this private link should expire - optional. By default private links expire in 365 days.
Date when this private link should expire - optional. By default private links expire in 365 days.

read_only.description: Optional, default true. Set to false to give private link users editing rights for this collection.

link.description: Url for an existing file that will not be uploaded on figshare

md5.description: MD5 sum pre computed on the client side

token.description: token received after initializing a file upload

name.description: name of file on upload server

startOffset.description: Indexes on byte range. zero-based and inclusive

endOffset.description: Indexes on byte range. zero-based and inclusive

locked.description: When a part is being uploaded it is being locked, by setting the locked flag to true. No changes/uploads can happen on this part from other requests.

articles.description: List of articles to be associated with the collection
